com.mdc.bot.util.event

Class CEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • com.mdc.bot.util.event.CEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.EventListener

    public class CEventListener
extends net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    Custom Event Listener Management class which listens for custom events as well as regular events and informs the registered listeners
    Author:
    xDestx

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(RListener r)
        Register a listener. Only accepts RListener to prevent overlap.
        Parameters:
        r - Custom Listener

      • unregisterListener

        public RListener unregisterListener(RListener r)
        Unregister a registered listener. Returns the listener on success, null on fail.
        Parameters:
        r - Custom Listener
        Returns:
        The listener removed, or null if it doesn't exist.
